for: reminding a tired, old comrade to speak bravely
reminding again that freedom matters, and helping me say it simply
art, banter, and a respect for things that are done
many years of faithful conspiracy, friendship, and grounding
singing the song of his corporate homeland
reminding that easy has to be simple
Zen in the face of crazy
camaraderie and wisdom in the ways of the payments
deep questions on stacking, inspiring locks
